description: This file contains CSS styles for the frontend of a Tic Tac Toe web application, defining themes, layout, and responsive behavior.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Styles for the main application container, including layout and theme management.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application, including background and alignment.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning and transitions.
